which <S%G3739><s%> in <S%G2398>its<s%> own <S%G2540>times<s%> he shall <S%G1166>show<s%>, who is the <S%G3107>blessed<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3441>only<s%> <S%G1413>Potentate<s%>, the <S%G935>King<s%> of <S%G936>kings<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> of <S%G2961>lords<s%>;
